# CMake project autogenerated by GENie
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.4)

project(texturec)
set(
source_list
  ../../../bimg/tools/texturec/texturec.cpp
)

include_directories(../../../bx/include)
include_directories(../../../bimg/include)
include_directories(../../include)
include_directories(../../../bimg/3rdparty/iqa/include)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS)

add_executable(texturec ${source_list})
target_link_libraries(texturec bimg_decode bimg_encode bimg bx)
